title: Prime Apartments - Uswetakeiyawa
details:
Experience the vistas and breeze of the Indian ocean while spending your relaxed holidays in front of Uswetakeiyawa's ever beautiful white sandy beaches. While the prospect of nature walks by the sea and through the lush coastal vegetation will instantly jolt you back.

Located in a Prime Location in the west coastal resort of Uswetakeiyawa from only 20 minutes away from Bandaranaike International Airport and just 30 minutes drive from the commercial capital of Colombo. the 14 story high rise comprises of one and two bedroom apartments filled with higher standard of branded fittings and amenities that bring a lifestyle you deserved.
